An optical fiber goes through the ground as so many fragments of strewed diamonds, whereas is reflected there the brightness of the pure crystal of the suspensions realized by the famous house Swarovski. Located close to the Opera House, and the department stores, a few steps from the Champs Elysees, our establishment rises on five floors, the last one of which is constituted by six executive rooms decorated with an equipment integrating the most modern splendors, such as Wi-Fi, television, television in the mirror of bathrooms, hatches Nespresso, and a iPod docking station. And, to allow you to organize your private meetings, we conceived a conference room, bathed by the light of our internal patio, and endowed with the most successful technology to this day. Offer yourselves a unique moment in Paris, and dive into a universe outside the time where you can express your desires, and be intoxicated by the magic of the luxury. The BEST WESTERN PREMIER Opera Diamond is the collaboration of an experience of several hotelkeepers generations, also, quite as the diamond answers a commitment of love and sincerity, each of the members of our team makes a commitment to answer you by the most sincere attentions. The BEST WESTERN PREMIER Opera Diamond: the customized luxury to the everyday life.

hotels.short_description: Radisson Blu Le Dokhan's Hotel Paris Trocadero is a luxury 4-star property offering elegant accommodation near the heart of Paris. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and an excellent location within short walking distance of the Arc de Triomphe, Champs Elysees and Eiffel Tower. The hotel is ideally situated between Avenue Kleber and Avenue Victor Hugo, both of which link directly to the Arc de Triomphe and Champs Elysees. The Trocadero district is very affluent and renowned for its ornate 19th-century buildings, large avenues and prestigious museums. Nearby places of interest include the Palais de Chaillot, Jardins du Trocadero and the Palais de Tokyo. Boissiere and Trocadero metro stations are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise corner property featuring a classic stone coloured facade with wrought iron faux balconies. It boasts an elegant interior with warm fireplaces, period furniture and beautiful artworks. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are cosy and showcase a refined, elegant decor with patterned wall fabrics, dark wood furniture and large windows. Amenities include air-conditioning, a small sitting area, work desk, mini-bar and flat-screen satellite TV with additional on-demand content. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a shower. Le Dokhan's Bar is an elegant venue where guests can enjoy breakfast, light lunch, afternoon tea and a wide range of champagne brands. There are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable private parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: California
hotels.short_description: Hotel California Champs-Elysees is a chic 4-star property offering stylish accommodation and modern services in the heart of Paris. It boasts a fitness centre, Wi-Fi and a fantastic location within steps of the Champs Elysees. The hotel is ideally situated on Rue de Berri. The Champs Elysees district surrounds the prestigious tree-lined avenue, famous for its cinemas, cafes and luxury boutiques. Nearby places of interest include the Arc de Triomphe, Place de la Concorde, Grand Palais and the Palais de l'Elysee. George V metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise property, featuring a stone coloured facade with arched columns and wrought iron faux balconies. Facilities include a modern fitness centre, and chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe Premium rooms are a spacious 30sqm and showcase a modern decor with stylish dark wood furnishings and large windows overlooking the courtyard or Rue de Berri. Some rooms boast a private terrace. Amenities include a work desk, wired internet, mini-bar and flat-screen satellite TV. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower or a separate walk-in shower, as well as bathrobes and slippers. The Cadre d'Or restaurant offers refined French and European cuisine complemented by an extensive wine list and elegant surroundings. A hearty breakfast is provided every morning. The lounge bar is a chic and intimate venue where guests can enjoy tasty snacks and a wide selection of international beverages. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable public parking is possible nearby.

hotels.name: B.W. Bretagne Montparnasse
hotels.short_description: The Best Western Bretagne Montparnasse is located on the left bank close to the TGV Atlantic terminal in the heart of the Quartier Montparnasse. Beginning of the century painters lived and worked here. The hotel is located near the city centre, in the Montparnasse area, at the Peripherique Exit Porte Brancion/Porte Vanves/Poste d'Orleans. The Best Western Bretagne Montparnasse, totally renovated to a very high standard offers 45 non-smoking and air-conditioning rooms, 11 of them accommodate either three, four or five people. Special offer for children under 12, please indicate in the comments part of your booking form the number of children traveling with you and their age. We offer special equipment for babies (crib, bathtub baby, warm feeding bottle). Please ask for the equipment at the booking time.

hotels.name: LA TREMOILLE
hotels.short_description: The hotel is located close to the Champs Elysees and Avenue George V in the so called Golden Triangle. There are many luxury designer shops and some of the most prestigious restaurants in the immediate vicinity. The standard rooms are medium in size and in excellent condition. The furniture have been made to measure and every room is different in decor but also in shape. All rooms have DVD. The safe boxes are large enoughfor lap tops and they also have sockets to recharge mobile phones. Every room has a hatch so that staff does not need to enter the rooms for room service. The bathrooms are small in some rooms, but are also in excellent condition. The breakfast room and restaurant is situated on the ground floor. It is decorated mostly in a grey and white colour scheme combining the traditional with the very modern. This is a beautiful traditional Parisian building, built in 1883. The lobby is of medium size, tastefully decorated in a subtle mixture of modern and traditional. The reception desk is made of glass, there are three small seating areas with modern and traditional furniture. The lobby features two crystal chandeliers. This is a an excellent 4 star, deluxe property, which was closed for over a year for total refubishment. The result is a very high standard product, combining tradition and modernity in subtle, tasteful style. (.

hotels.name: Lancaster
hotels.short_description: Lancaster is a luxury 5-star hotel offering elegant accommodation and personalised services in the heart of Paris. It boasts free Wi-Fi, a Michelin-starred restaurant, fitness centre and fantastic location within steps of the Champs Elysees. The hotel is ideally situated on Rue de Berri. The Champs Elysees district surrounds the prestigious tree-lined avenue, famous for its cinemas, cafes and luxury boutiques. Nearby places of interest include the Arc de Triomphe, Place de la Concorde, Grand Palais and the Palais de l'Elysee. George V metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel occupies a traditional mid-rise building, featuring a charming stone coloured facade with wrought iron faux balconies. It was built in 1889 and houses a chic decor, combining classic and modern styles, with an extensive collection of valuable artworks and antiques. Facilities include a complimentary modern fitness centre and a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe Suites showcase a classic decor with wood floors, elegant antique furniture, beautiful artworks and large windows. They comprise a 32sqm bedroom and separate 21sqm living room with a coffee table, sofa and armchairs. Some suites boast private terraces. Amenities include a work desk, mini-bar, iPod dock and flat-screen satellite TV. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The Michelin-starred La Table du Lancaster offers refined French cuisine and an extensive wine list in an intimate dining room. Le Grand Salon is a chic venue, complete with an adjoining garden courtyard, where guests can enjoy traditional French dishes, light snacks and a wide range of creative cocktails and international beverages. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable private parking is possible onsite.

hotels.name: Hyatt Paris Madeleine
hotels.short_description:
מלון הייאט פריז מדלן  (Hyatt Paris Madeleine)הנו מלון 5 כוכבים יוקרתי ומפנק במרכז פריז.
אטרקציות בקרבת מקום: מוזיאון הלובר, גני טיולרי, בית האופרה גרנייה ( Opera Garnier ) , בית הכלבו גלרי לאפייט ( Galeries Lafayette ), כנסיית מדלן (Madeleine). ושדרת הקניות האוסמן (Haussmann) .
חדרי המלון מעוצבים באופן אישי וכוללים מיזוג אוויר, מסך טלוויזיה שטוח וחדר רחצה פרטי הכולל מוצרי טיפוח יוקרתיים.
מתקני המלון כוללים מסעדות , בית קפה, מתחם ספא מעוצב, וכל זאת במיקום מעולה בקרבת כיכר מדלן (Madeleine ) שהנו אזור יוקרתי ונחשב ברובע ה-8 של העיר, בקרבת האופרה.
תחנת המטרו Saint-Augustin נמצאת בקרבת מקום ומספקת גישה מהירה ונוחה ליעדים עיקריים ברחבי העיר.

hotels.short_description: Renaissance Paris Vendome is a 5-star boutique hotel offering luxury accommodation, facilities and services in the heart of Paris. It boasts an indoor pool, spa, a two Michelin-starred restaurant and an ideal location just steps from the Louvre Museum. The hotel is located on Rue du Mont Thabor, close to the luxury boutiques on Rue Saint Honore and Rue de Rivoli. The 1st arrondissement is an old and illustrious central district dominated by the Tuileries Garden. Nearby places of interest include the world-famous Louvre Museum, the Musee de l'Orangerie, Palais-Royal, Place Vendome and the modern shopping centre in Les Halles. Tuileries metro station is located just outside, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a period townhouse with a classic white facade and wrought iron faux balconies. Facilities include a luxury spa with access exclusive to hotel guests. It features a complimentary fitness centre with cardiovascular equipment and free weights, an indoor swimming pool, sauna, steam room and sunbeds. The spa also offers a range of beauty treatments, massages and wellness therapies. Junior Suites are 35sqm and comprised of a separate bedroom and living area. They feature a sofa-bed, luxury furniture and bright decor. Amenities include air-conditioning, an LCD TV with on-demand content, DVD player, iPod dock, work desk, mini-bar and complimentary bottled mineral water. The sleek marble bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower, two bathrobes, slippers and Bulgari toiletries. Le Pinxo is a two Michelin-starred restaurant created by renowned chef Alain Dutournier. It serves fine French cuisine in beautiful three portion dishes surrounded by a casual, contemporary environment. Bar Chinois is a cosy and intimate bar with Chinese inspiration and antiques, offering a range of international dishes. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.

hotels.name: Le Burgundy
hotels.short_description: Le Burgundy is an ultra-chic 5-star hotel offering well-presented accommodation and excellent service in the heart of Paris. It boasts a Michelin-starred restaurant, luxurious spa and a fantastic location just steps from the boutiques of Rue Saint-Honore. The hotel is ideally situated on Rue Duphot, just southeast from La Madeleine church. The 1st arrondissement is an old and illustrious central district dominated by the Tuileries Garden. Nearby places of interest include the world-famous Louvre Museum, the Musee de l'Orangerie, Palais-Royal, Place Vendome and the modern shopping centre in Les Halles. Concorde and Madeleine metro stations are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a mid-rise 18th-century townhouse with a cream facade and wrought iron faux balconies. The chic interior features ornate marble floors and unique artwork. Facilities include a spa and health club, which incorporates a 15m indoor swimming pool, fitness centre, sauna and steam room. A range of beauty and wellness treatments are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Junior Suites are approximately 37sqm and have a luxurious decor with a separate bedroom and living area. The neutral beige tones of the walls complement the richly upholstered armchairs, crystal lamps and contemporary glass and chromium desks. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV with additional pay-per-view channels, iPod dock and mini-bar. The en-suite bathrooms have smart stone and marble surfaces. They feature a bathtub with integrated shower and a separate walk-in shower. Le Baudelaire is an elegantly decorated Michelin-starred restaurant offering French cuisine. During warm weather the restaurant opens an adjoining terrace where guests can eat alfresco. Guests can also enjoy a range of fine teas, delicious pastries and sandwiches in the Winter Garden, while Bar Le Baudelaire offers cognacs, champagne and a generous selection of liqueurs in relaxing surroundings. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.

hotels.name: Mac Mahon
hotels.short_description: Located in central Paris, Hotel Champs Elysees Mac Mahon is steps from Place de l'Etoile and Arc de Triomphe. Nearby points of interest also include Palais des Congres de Paris and Eiffel Tower. Hotel Champs Elysees Mac Mahon's restaurant serves breakfast, dinner, and appetizers. A bar/lounge is open for drinks. Room service is available during limited hours. The hotel serves hot and cold buffet breakfasts in the restaurant (surcharges apply). Complimentary wireless Internet access is available in public areas and the hotel has an Internet point. Additional property amenities include a terrace, multilingual staff, and tour/ticket assistance. This is a smoke-free property. 40 guestrooms at Hotel Champs Elysees Mac Mahon feature MP3 docking stations and minibars. Beds come with premium bedding. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers with handheld showerheads and rainfall showerheads. They also offer designer toiletries, bathrobes, and slippers. Wireless Internet access is complimentary. In addition to desks and complimentary newspapers, guestrooms offer phones. 40-inch LCD televisions have satellite channels. Laptop-compatible safes, windows that open, and blackout drapes/curtains are also provided. Housekeeping is offered weekly and guests may request irons/ironing boards.

hotels.name: The Westin Paris - Vendome
hotels.type: Deluxe Room - 2 Single Beds Or Double Bed Or King Bed; Deluxe Non-smoking, Heavenly Bed, Spacious Room, Elegant, Luxurious Marble Bathroom
hotels.short_description: Recharge at The Westin Paris, overlooking the magnificent Tuileries Gardens. Our historic landmark hotel is ideally located in the very heart of Pariss history and culture, just a few steps away from the Louvre Museum, Place de la Concorde, the renowned Place Vendome, and the elegant Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honore with its myriad of fashion boutiques. Whether youre traveling for business or leisure, The Westin Paris is the only place where you can be at your best. Each of our 438 guest rooms and suites are elegantly appointed and equipped with the signature Heavenly Bed. Some of Pariss most beautiful and eternal treasures - the Louvre Museum, Tuileries Gardens, and the Eiffel Tower - are in full view, offering an unparalleled vision of the city. All guest rooms feature satellite TV and Internet access through the television system. Furthermore, our interactive video system (video on demand) allows you to choose from a selection of movies available. Our rooms also include dual-line speakerphones with voicemail and room service. A 24-hour concierge service is available to assist you with your leisure and travel plans.The Westin Paris provides a wide variety of services to help you relax and unwind throughout your stay. Our associates will go out of their way to meet your unique needs and provide personal services to delight you during your stay. On-site services include the spacious fitness centre, which provides equipment and facilities on a complimentary basis, 24 hours a day, year-round. Our Westin Workout Gym will be available in late 2006. The state-of-the-art Business Centre provides you with a personal office featuring laptop computer rental, photocopying, and High Speed Internet Access available on-site Our meeting rooms are amongst the most beautiful in Paris, including three salons featuring impressive second empire-style frescos. Totaling 1,982 square meters, they can accommodate up to 1,000 delegates in daylight for prestigious events of all kinds, from fashion shows to theatrical productions and award ceremonies.A variety of dining options are available, including the restaurant 234 Rivoli and Tuileries Bar. A true highlight is the superb central courtyard, La Terrace Fleurie, which is home to our unique open-air restaurant. The on-site fitness facility offers running machines, exercise bikes, rowing machines, steppers, and body building machines. Joggers can enjoy the trail in Tuileries Gardens.**Please note, breakfast is not free for children sharing a room with their parents. This will be paid upon departure by the guest.**.

hotels.name: Meurice
hotels.short_description: Le Meurice is a grand 5-star hotel offering spacious accommodation and a fantastic location overlooking the Tuileries Garden in the heart of Paris. It boasts a luxury spa, state-of-the-art fitness centre and a three Michelin-starred restaurant. The hotel is located on the prestigious shopping street Rue de Rivoli, between Place de la Concorde and the world-famous Louvre Museum. The 1st arrondissement is an old and illustrious central district dominated by the Tuileries Garden. Nearby places of interest include the Musee de l'Orangerie, Palais-Royal, Place Vendome and the modern shopping centre in Les Halles. Tuileries metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel occupies a grand palace featuring a stone coloured facade with arched columns, wrought iron faux balconies and a mansard roof. The elegant exterior houses a beautifully-appointed interior, designed by Philippe Starck, which combines traditional French design with discreet modern amenities. Facilities include a luxury spa comprising massage treatment rooms, steam rooms, a Jacuzzi, fitness centre and sauna. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior Suites are 65sqm and showcase a classic decor with white, cream and bronze hues, period furnishings and large windows with courtyard views. They comprise a spacious bedroom, separate oversized living room and dressing room. Amenities include a large work desk, generous closet space, mini-bar, iPod dock and flat-screen satellite TV with additional pay-per-view content. A DVD player and stereo are available on request. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a large bathtub, walk-in shower, bathrobes and slippers. The three Michelin-starred Restaurant Le Meurice offers refined French cuisine complemented by an extensive wine list, while Restaurant Le Dali serves continental breakfast, afternoon tea and diverse international dishes. Bar 228 is a warm and cosy venue, complete with wooden bar stools and leather armchairs, where guests can enjoy tasty snacks and a wide selection of creative cocktails and alcoholic beverages. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable private parking is possible nearby.

hotels.name: BEST WESTERN Ducs De Bourgogne
hotels.short_description: The Best Western Ducs de Bourgogne boasts an exceptional location in the very heart of historic Paris, offering its guests Parisian authenticity only a few minutes from some of the most popular landmarks in the world: the Louvre Museum, the Tuileries Gardens, Notre Dame de Paris, Saint-Germain-des-Pres, the Sainte-Chapelle, the Centre Beaubourg and the Place Vendôme are all just a few minutes from your room. Located near rue du Faubourg Saint Honoré, within walking distance of Champs-Elysées and Louvre Museum.

hotels.name: MANDARIN ORIENTAL PARIS
hotels.short_description: Mandarin Oriental Paris is a 5-star superior property offering luxury accommodation next to the prestigious Place Vendome in the heart of Paris. It boasts stylish interiors, Michelin-starred dining and a luxury spa with indoor pool. The 1st arrondissement is an old and illustrious central district dominated by the Tuileries Garden. Nearby places of interest include the world-famous Louvre Museum, the Musee de l'Orangerie, Palais-Royal and the modern shopping centre in Les Halles. Concorde metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a grand mid-rise property, designed around a verdant courtyard. Facilities include a luxury spa with an indoor swimming pool, fitness centre, sauna, steam room and massage treatment rooms. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are 37sqm and stunningly designed in a soft, neutral palette with splashes of vibrant colour and contemporary artwork on the walls. They overlook the fashionable boutiques of Rue Saint-Honore. Amenities include Bang & Olufsen technology, a flat-screen TV, PlayStation 3, iPod dock, Nespresso coffee machine and a mini-bar. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower and a TV built into the mirror. Guests can expect a sensory and gourmet experience in Sur Mesure par Thierry Marx, an exclusive two Michelin-starred restaurant. Modern French cuisine is served in the all-day dining restaurant, Camelia. The hotel also has a chic bar and a cake shop with signature and seasonal delicacies. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Valet parking is possible.

hotels.name: PARK HYATT PARIS VENDOME
hotels.short_description: Park Hyatt Paris Vendome is a stunning 5-star hotel offering modern accommodation, personalised services and exceptional leisure facilities in the heart of Paris. It boasts a luxury spa, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a Michelin-starred restaurant just north of Place Vendome. The hotel is situated on the prestigious Rue de la Paix. The Opera district encompasses the 9th arrondissement and several surrounding areas. It is the commercial centre, home to flagship shops, entertainment venues and renowned museums. Nearby places of interest include the Palais Garnier opera house and the large department stores of Galeries Lafayette and Printemps. Opera metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a 7-storey building with a beautiful white facade and wrought iron balconies. Facilities include a state-of-the art fitness centre and a luxury spa comprising massage treatment rooms, a whirlpool, saunas and a steam room. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. The Vendome Suite is an incredible 200sqm and showcases a contemporary decor finished in impeccable detail with wood, silk and bronze. It boasts an oversized living area, a separate bedroom and a 60sqm balcony with views of Rue de la Paix and the Vendome column. Amenities include a large work desk, a Blu-ray DVD player, surround sound system and a flat-screen computer with satellite TV channels and a colour printer. The en-suite bathroom features a Jacuzzi, a steam room shower and a massage treatment table, in addition to under-floor heating and luxury toiletries. Exceptional dining opportunities include the Michelin-starred Le Pur, where guests can sample refined European cuisine accompanied by fine wines. The award-winning Le Bar is a trendy venue offering tasty snacks and a wide range of alcoholic beverages, while the elegant La Cheminee serves afternoon tea and light appetisers. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable private parking is possible onsite.
